comment: This file tells Vercel how to deploy your project.

builds.comment: Build 1: Serve everything in the /public folder as static files (HTML, CSS, images etc.)
Build 2: Run every .js file inside /api as a serverless function (backend code)

routes.comment: Route 1: Any request to /api/* goes to the matching file in our /api folder
Route 2: Everything else (/, /about, etc.) serves the main index.html page
